author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Delta Galil Reports Q1 EPS $0.30
text:
May 14 (Reuters) - Delta Galil Industries Ltd:
* Q1 SALES ROSE 6 PERCENT TO $334.5 MILLION * SEES FY 2018 EARNINGS PER SHARE $2.11 TO $2.30 EXCLUDING ITEMS
* SEES FY 2018 SALES $1.4 BILLION TO $1.44 BILLION * REAFFIRMS 2018 GUIDANCE Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
